title:
Inhomogeneous long-range percolation in the strong decay regime:
  recurrence in one dimension
abstract:
We provide a sufficient criterion for the recurrence of spatial random graphs
on the real line based on the scarceness of long-edges. In particular, this
complements earlier recurrence results obtained by Gracar et al. (Electron. J.
Probab. 27 (2022)) and a transience criterion derived by the author (Probab.
Theory Related Fields 189, no. 3-4 (2024)).
